data.Response: I was bitten by a feral cat.
My mother bought me ice cream, but it melted too quickly.

template.description: This horizontal bar chart accomodates particularly long text labels. It's great for displaying survey data in which responses can be as long as whole sentences.
template.title: Horizontal bar chart (paragraph text)

text.author: Jane Doe / DMN
text.chatter: Twenty-three and one quarter people were asked, "How was your day?"
text.headline: Carpe Diem
